Name: Xiahu
Alliance: Dengying wucun (Dengying five village ritual alliance)
Village_Settlement: Xiahu was originally known as Xiawu 下吴. The entire village has approximately 500 people.
Surname_Groups: The main surname group is the Chen 陈.
Village_Temples: Jifu xinshê 集福新社 is dedicated to Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王, Houtu furen 后土夫人. Left: Zhanggong shengjun 张公 圣君. Right: Wulu jiangjun 五路将军.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/16, the incense burners of the shê altars 社炉 are taken to every household to practice the Dao and to go on procession within the village. Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rites.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 3/3: The birthday celebration of Xuantian shangdi 玄天上帝 is celebrated by participating in the procession of Beichengong 北辰宫 and Guchenggong 谷城宫. 10/8: The birthday celebration of Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人 is held. Opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals.
